channel.title: PGR4 or BF:BC?
channel.description: Well, I bought Battlefield: Bad Company a few days after release, played it for a few weeks, then started playing less and less. I still have it today, and I haven't played it since the end of the summer. It's a good game and all, however I just can't see myself holding onto it and continuing to play it, as I haven't beaten the game yet (it's a long ass campaign). So, I knew a few people who got PGR4 for christmas, and they say it's a really good, and entertaining game. Watching the trailer (http://www.gametrailers.com/player/25838.html) I think it's actually a good game, but I'm curious to see other's inputs. So, what should I do? Trade in BF:BC and get PGR4 or keep BF:BC?

item.title: PGR4 or BF:BC?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:19, topic:253625”]i love my racing games as i do my FPS, but i prefer FPS on the PC, and Racing Games on the console! Forza 2 was/is my favourite racing game.

BUT, PGR has always been a good game with high quality graphics, i suggest trading the BF:BC in for it, the only decent thing about BF is the multiplayer, which gets boring after a while.[/quote]

I’d say my favorite racing game is between Viper Racing, and Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit (the original!)

edit: for consoles though it would be California Speed or Star Wars: Pod Racer on the N64

Read full topic

pretty much same graphics as forza motorsport

item.title: PGR4 or BF:BC?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

i love my racing games as i do my FPS, but i prefer FPS on the PC, and Racing Games on the console! Forza 2 was/is my favourite racing game.

BUT, PGR has always been a good game with high quality graphics, i suggest trading the BF:BC in for it, the only decent thing about BF is the multiplayer, which gets boring after a while.

Read full topic

item.title: PGR4 or BF:BC?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:16, topic:253625”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=335044.msg2658336#msg2658336 date=1234022093]
I play CoD on the computer, and I have CoD 3 for the Wii. CoD 4 was a horrible game, 3 and 5 are Ok, but they are pretty much the same as Medal of Honor (the old ones, remember spearhead? ;))

Battlefield 1942 is the best, with Battlefield Vietnam coming in a close second.
[/quote]

Oh yeah, I forgot your love for WWII games. Way to be open minded! :P[/quote]

I said I liked Battlefield Vietnam too
